about:
Driven hands-on leader with more than 20 years of experience in operations, manufacturing and material handling. 

Proven ability to build, coach, and mentor teams. 

I guide staff through organizational changes, and introduce policies that encourage employee’s motivation while ensuring adherence to safety standards, best practices, and regulations. 

Expertise in continuous improvement, focused on maximizing efficiency without increasing costs. Demonstrated history of collaborating across organizational levels within startup and growing companies. 

A former Marine, Ironman and ultra marathoner.
topSkills: Operations • Leadership • Customer Satisfaction • Operations Management • Warehouse Operations

experience.description: Ensure smooth coordination across warehousing, distribution, logistics, and personnel management. Maintain high operational standards, streamlining processes, and achieving long-term business success while managing teams, optimizing workflows, ensuring compliance with food safety protocols.

I lead the optimization of warehouse operations at Hill Climber Warehouse Consulting in Austin, Texas. By designing layouts and maximizing space utilization, I enhanced efficiency and streamlined processes. Specializing in effective slotting and team building, I collaborate with clients to achieve operational excellence and significant cost savings.

Detail-oriented leadership role responsible for facilitating and developing organizational efficiency and long-term business growth through oversight of the administrative, logistic, and storage functions at Montage Logistics a third-party logistics company. Work closely with stakeholders to manage contracts, coordinate logistics operations, manage labor needs, explore business development opportunities, and implement best practices.

Guide daily warehouse operations for startup facility. Designed, sourced and oversaw the installation of racking and other warehouse features, as well as source materials and equipment to ensure setup meets operational needs. Recruit, hire, and train warehouse team. Monitor logistics and shipping agreements to ensure timely fulfillment of customer orders. 
•	Recruited to lead relocation process and buildout of new 50K sq. ft. warehouse following move from Chicago area, including ensuring simultaneous management of distribution center. 
•	Transitioned operations from a 3PL to the company’s first North American in-house distribution center.

Managed daily warehouse operations from order fulfillment and supply chain oversight through Shipping & Receiving. Reviewed and maintained inventory control to ensure stock levels met organizational demands. Nurtured relationships with suppliers, customers, and transportation partners to meet delivery timelines and schedules. Ensured compliance with all regulations, safety protocols, company policies, contract terms, and legislative guidelines. 
•	Served as coach and mentor to warehouse team, building a customer-centric and service-focused culture.

Directed warehouse operations for organization, including staffing and recruitment, team coaching, shipping and receiving, and inventory management. Conducted inspections of all incoming and outgoing shipments to ensure accuracy, quality, and on-time delivery. Provided preventive and emergency maintenance for all equipment to reduce cost of repairs and minimize downtime. Reconciled invoices by cross-checking all shipment data. 
•	Spearheaded reorganization of shift schedules by breaking single eight-hour shift into two shifts, which resulted in significant increases to productivity by creating a ten-hour workday without increasing labor costs. 
•	Cultivated rapport with Express Employment Professionals, negotiating contracts for staffing and collaborating on onboarding procedures to streamline integration of new hires into daily operations. 
•	Championed workplace culture initiatives that created a fun and engaging work environment and encouraged positive competition between team members, while also ensuring compliance with safety standards.  
•	Designed layout for warehouse to maximize efficiency and floor space. 
•	Maintained high rates of customer satisfaction for consistently meeting delivery timelines and emphasizing commitment to quality in all operations.

Daily lead distribution, sales training and development, working with retail locations for lead followup, hiring process for all sales positions, creating new revenue sources and processes for sales people to work, and metrics reporting.

Signpost is cloud-based marketing software that gives local businesses the power to effortlessly build and manage customer relationships.

Our software builds customer profiles by capturing every email, call and credit card transaction. Signpost’s automated marketing engine then uses this data to drive new customer conversion and loyalty, reviews and referrals from existing customers. We empower local businesses by delivering measurable results while saving valuable time.

Named one of America's Most Promising Companies by Forbes, Signpost is backed by Spark Capital, Google Ventures, OpenView Venture Partners, Scout Ventures and a group of angel investors including Jason Calacanis, Thomas Lehrman, and Jack Herrick. The company is headquartered in New York City with locations in Austin and Denver.

-Lead team of 10-14 Sales Representatives

-Interviewed majority of sales rep candidates

Some of my main responsibilities are to coach and guide new and existing employees and drive improvement in sales productivity metrics by developing sales skills. I routinely participate on sales calls or calibrations sessions, lead team meetings, work directly with sales management to develop coaching plans, 1 on 1 sessions, and other mediums to develop sales people. The average week included over 50 1 on 1 sessions, 4 different group trainings, and multiple side by side trainings.

Lead a new sales team of 16-20 out bound sales reps for one of the largest Communication companies in the U.S. Coached reps of various experience levels well above weekly and monthly quotas by performing 1 on 1 coaching, side by sides, call monitoring, and teaching product and sales tactics. 
Interviewed, hired team members growing our program from 50 to 200 sales people. Mentored and trained other sales managers. Created and developed programs and best practices for ramping reps, as well as other items used across the company. My accomplishments included the 162% billing to goal within my teams 1st 6 months of conception, most team billed in 2013, and the lowest team attrition rates of all teams. 6 of my reps were promoted into management or more technically demanding sales positions. As a rep I was awarded most improved in my 1st month and coach’s choice award in my 6th month.
